billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

title: Establishes a historic preservation revolving loan program to provide interest free loans to municipalities for historic preservation projects
summary: Establishes a historic preservation revolving loan program, within the office of parks, recreation and historic preservation, to provide interest free loans to municipalities for historic preservation projects.
currentCommittee: CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION
lawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
actClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing a historic preservation revolving loan program
